message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but that's a bit too high for me. Would you consider $85?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $92.50
I understand, Alice. How about we split the difference and settle at $88?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. How about we try $90.50?
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. I'm willing to go up a little bit, but $90 is the absolute highest I can go.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're running out of time, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but that's as low as I can go. If we can't agree on that, I'll have to consider other options
